results.title: Passing through
results.brief_description: A young family on their way to visit relatives pass through an old gold mining town. As the woman begins to delve into memories of her childhood, the family leave to continue their journey. Has she missed the opportunity to discover the secrets of the past?
results.description: A young family on their way to visit relatives pass through an old gold mining town. As the woman begins to delve into memories of her childhood, the family leave to continue their journey. Has she missed the opportunity to discover the secrets of the past?

results.title: Passing the know-how along
results.brief_description: Provides some ideas for the experienced worker to help and guide and new worker in their job. Analyse and plan your instructions; select key points where real skill is required and stress these points; show how to do it; let the person watch you do it again; let them do the simple parts of the job; help with do the whole job with constructive advice; let them do the whole job but watch; put them on their own. Adapted from a bulletin of the Training within Industry Section of the Office of Production Management entitled “Helping the experienced worker to break in a man on a new job”. A National Defence film.

results.title: Passing out
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Six of the best”.
Introduces the six main characters of the series - Brian, Antoni, Carl, Paula, Saly and Theresa who are Year 11 students leaving school. A popular teacher tries to get his class to face up to what they will do when they leave school. He challenges them with a cynical view of the world.

results.title: Passing out
results.creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Corporation and Simon Target
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “The Academy”.
The third year cadets are graduating and the rehearsal is a test to many as standing out in sweltering heat for an hour sees many of them fainting. Kizzy will find out the outcome of her proposal to the Commandant to let her graduate, despite her injury, and attend the Graduation Ball which they are all looking forward to after three years of discipline and hard work.

results.title: Passing moments
results.brief_description:
Fade in, fade out. The present moment never lasts. Everything you see and feel right now will leave you…. The five vignettes are all shot during one train journey through the Madhya Pradesh state of India. The camera lense lingers briefly, in slow motion, on the passing landscapes and inhabitants - capturing the mood and movements of the outside world.
Soundtrack recorded and produced by Sami Ramir.

results.title: Passing era of the steam horse [B&W]
results.brief_description: Steam locomotives have been replaced by diesels on the Victorian Railways. Their history in the system is briefly covered, and various types are shown in operation, concluding with the narrow gauge service from Ferntree Gully to Gembrook being restored as a tourist feature.
results.description: Steam locomotives have been replaced by diesels on the Victorian Railways. Their history in the system is briefly covered, and various types are shown in operation, concluding with the narrow gauge service from Ferntree Gully to Gembrook being restored as a tourist feature.

results.title: Passe Ton Bac D'abord = Graduate First
results.brief_description:
In a provincial city in the mining region of Northern France, a group of disillusioned students with no prospects other than dead-end jobs or unemployment, see little point in doing any work for their ‘baccalaureat’ (high school certificate). Ignoring the futile dissertations of their teachers, they drift aimlesslly round the local bistro or down the coast; some engage in hollow sexual encounters; others go to Paris. Pialat’s minutely detailed observation of dispossessed youth is made with an admirable combination of objectivity and compassion.

Credits: Producer, Maurice Pialat ; director, Maurice Pialat ; writer, Maurice Pialat ; photography, Pierre-William Glenn ; music, Patrick Juvet.
Cast: Sabine Haudepin, Philippe Marland, Valerie Chassigneux, Annick Alane, Michel Caron.

results.title: Passage west. Program 2: The Awakening
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, British Broadcasting Corporation, Bill Brind and Philip Donnellan
results.brief_description: Program 2 looks at the fortunes and misfortunes of British immigrants to Prince Edward Island, through a re-enactment of their history, letters, diaries, and interviews with their children and grandchildren.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, British Broadcasting Corporation, Bill Brind and Philip Donnellan
